title: stuck at 33%
body: [Client]The recent patch has been stuck on 33% and endlessly scanning files. Is restarted my computer and closed league twice. No progress has been made. Help plz?

replies.body: [Client] forgot to add this on title lol
How long was it scanning files for, and did it stop at a number for an extended period of time (10 min+)?
If you ask me..we should get free things for our time ;) am I right?
League of Legends is free to play ;) am I right?
I feel stupid was stuck on 33 percent for a while but i  dced from my wifi by mistake so i was annoyed by being stuck at 33 lol.
The patcher has been scanning files for more than 30 minutes and is still going.

I can't speak for the original poster but when I had this issue, I left it for a solid 40 minutes and it was still scanning files. I tried doing the client rebuild and left that alone for about an hour, and that ran into the same issue. Only reinstalling from scratch seemed to fix it.
I had this happen to me t oday, It scanned up to at least 1000 items ( I alt tabbed out for awhile) and took about 10 -15 mins to finish
10 min+? try literally two hours waiting for scanning to stop. Only for it to freeze while finally downloading at 59%. Is there a way to skip the scanning step?

Hey if anyone is still struggling, I got mine to work.

1. you just have to wait for the scanning to finish, which for me was like a 2 hour process, you can't really run anything else while it's happening unless you have a better potato running league than I do.

2. after scanning switch to EU WEST for way more speed, like literally double or triple as fast. If you see it hit zero Kbps, don't panic, you computer is doing computer things and isn't going to start downloading again until it finishes. If you feel like you have waited too long just try to switch to a different region again and see if that results in it resuming download (if not, your computer is doing computer things).

3. complain to riot for making a patch update this large come out as one potato shattering chunk

I do not know if I am allowed to do this, but I have posted on Reddit with a temporary fix and a discussion on what may be causing this problem since patch 4.15: http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2itjji/are_you_having_problems_with_your_lol_patcher_415/
I would like to help you help us so please feel free to ask me more questions. I've encountered almost all of the problems (infinite scanning, lol launcher not starting, lol patcher getting stuck on 33%, update failed, etc.) and have been able to get into league and play after encountering each problem.
3 times its been over 10+ minutes, and nothing. I dont want to have to reinstall the client as last time it wouldnt reinstall for a whole day (was during the mac client bugs etc) any solutions?
it scanned until 3000 files, then stopped to say it has failed to work. either pls continue or send logs. but when i clicked send logs, nothing happened.
Same for me pls riot i pay u money's
why is lol stuck at 33% now I can't play at all!!!!!?????

Ok, So I have been going through this problem for the past 2 DAYS!!!! I have been mentally going crazy so basically I have tried out changing the region, re-installing it but yea those didn't work out. 
FINALLY I come across a SOLUTION - WHICH ACTUALLY WORKKKSS!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 
This is only for windows tho - so basically you go to your C Drive, Riot Games, League Of Legends, RADS, Projects, lol_game_client, and delete the 'filearchives' folder. Then open League Of Legends and wait...and then you get started from 33%

GOOD LUCK :D

I've recently had a simliar problem with getting stuck at 33% and endlessly scanning files. (Windows 7) Like over 15k+ files. I noticed that this is usually the cause when you are in the middle of patching and suddenly while patching, it drops to 0kps and you rage quit and exit the patcher. I honestly don't know what the problem is, but for me I believe it was just my internet and connection.. (trying to patch at school LOL) but I've read in recent forums that people have really good internet and have dropped to 0kps. While patching today, it was pretty steady until after 33%. It kept going from 0kps-300kps and then dying back down. I thought if I let it wait it would patch eventually. It did move at 0kps though. it moved 1% every 2 hours but I gave up after that. I'm not really sure the problem is for 0kps so I can't really help there.

But for the endlessly scanning files I discovered that if you delete some folders in the league folder. Deleting the stuff in (RADS/solutions) and the folder lol_launcher (RADS/projects) and then try patching again. It will probably take a while and it will continue to scan files. But I took note that the League of Legends folder is about 24k files. Check properties, and henceforth if you are scanning over 24k files, clearly something is wrong. I've had this issue before and and deleted the 2 things i mentioned earlier + lol_game_client (I believe, not quite sure) and left if over night to patch again. And when I woke up it was ready to go! It may scan for quite a while, couple o hours, then it whould be able to patch soo an extra half hour or so. I'm scanning right now and I'm at 12k files. Gonna leave it for the night and see the outcome tomorrow morning. I'll post if mines functional or not. 

New to forums and stuff like this. >.< Sorry if this is too long, but I can tell this problem is cheezing a lot of people. Me too D: Hope this helps!

**Update**I didn't leave it on for the night cause my computer went to sleep. So I had to resume it when I woke up. It finally finished! After 5 hours of scanning and patching. Jeeez. So it ended up scanning around 30k files for me. I don't get it but after that it started patching again... While it was patching, it dropped to 0kps a few times, but it got back up a bit later. Well, note is that DO NOT CLOSE YOUR CLIENT WHEN PATCHING. IT WILL HONESTLY **** IT UP.  Give it some time.
well this time it stoped scanning files and  is now downloading its  still at 33% though. but i believe it will work lol
Omg thx I read all of that im going to try it right now  I think this might work :DD

guys, i had the exact same problem and it scanned up to 8k files, until i found a video on youtube explaining how to fix the problem. I dont know if im allowed to post the link so i will just tell you what I did.

1. in your game files navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.113
(so click rads folder click projects etc untill you get to 0.01.113)
2. copy and paste releasemanifest, 
3. open the copy using notepad, edit -> select all, and delete everything
4. close the file and rename S_OK
5. open your launcher and get back to playing some LoL

i was downlading files for an hour then i tried this and i got in in less than a minute, try it it works.
Me either it says 33% and  1 file scanned*
Didn't work for me.  Tried.
anybody else try this fix?
Have to say this worked!  Thanks!!!
The amount of files to scan is somewhere right above 14k-15k files. Just to give people a frame of reference.
The same happens to me nearly every patch... I have to fix my client in the settings on the launcher screen...

I used to play league all the time for years but took about a 9 month break. I have a mac and came back to rekindle my old flame with Fizz and keep getting stuck at 33%. This has been happening for over a week now. I have literally tried 15 different "Solutions" from several sources and have had no success. Can someone from RIOT explain how to fix this issue? I am going to give up on it in the next few days. Thanks

my computer is doing the same thing right now, ive been trying to get it to load up for a few days, currently its at 33% scanning 1200+ files. its gone up to 3400 files before i restart it. i tried to fix my client in the options but eventually it stops fixing at the 33% bug returns. any reds wanna update with a fix?
Same here. Please Riot, fix this.

Had the same problem.  When it starts to patch just change your server location and language and let it start to load for a few seconds then change it back to your proper server and language and it will start to load properly.  Trust me this does work, i just did it now.
The S_OK trick worked even for the 4.18 patch.  Thanks!!
I'm kinda scared to it happen to me and it's been on for 5 hours plz fix

It downloaded and installed for me last night but i woke up this morning..... and here we are again SCANNING THESE FILES AGAIN after the patch was already installed but be patient and it will install.
im also struck at 33%
nvm it just freed it's self after 5 mins. thinking it may have been a large file at that spot.
20 minutes, and 2500 files later.... still waiting to play this messed up and broken game....

guys i found solution go to EuNu server and download the patch and install it and then on patching time change region to NA then continue if it's stuck on 79% 242Mb  just leave it i will finish automatic just wait  and it will disapear and press lunch have fun

will try. Thanks.

Do you mean let the EuNu fully patch or just quickly switch there and back?
After fighting with it for 4 plus hours stuck at 33%, all i did was switch to the oceanic server and then switched back, IT FIX'D the problem lol
im at about 150493 files and those other comments about deleting files do not help.
LOL - like this is a new problem, there are 3 year old threads on the good forums about this. I (like every single patch) am experiencing this also.

It is fine now I don't know what was the problem. I uninstalled and reinstalled but it was stuck at 250 or something at okbps. Its ok now.
I had the same issue last patch. Try reinstalling the game - worked for me.
I'm having the same problem someone please find a solution, I really want to play league and get platinum before end of season!
